definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
fontanel (gap between the bones of an infant's skull)

sentences.english: Her dark hair waved untidy across her broad forehead.
sentences.chinese: 她的黑发散乱地飘拂在宽阔的脑门子上。

sentences.english: Does it look like I have Westinghouse written on my forehead?
sentences.chinese: 难道我脑门上写着西屋电气么？

sentences.english: A high forehead hairline, very wide, brain door.
sentences.chinese: 发际线天生高，额头显得很宽，大脑门。

sentences.english: The suspense grew, along with the beads of sweat forming on our foreheads.
sentences.chinese: 随着脑门上的汗水不断滴下，我们的疑虑也在增加。

sentences.english: You can expand the forehead and reduce the size of the chin.
sentences.chinese: 你可以扩大脑门并减小下巴。

sentences.english: Papa said, clapping a hand to his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸说，用手拍了拍自己的脑门儿。

sentences.english: Does it look like I have a G.E. logo printed on my forehead?
sentences.chinese: 难道我看起来脑门上是印着通用电气的商标吗？

sentences.english: Don't let the door close on those memories.
sentences.chinese: 不要让脑门闭上，看不见这些记忆。

sentences.english: A few good first type dove, yellow bike has a very good drum forehead.
sentences.chinese: 几只头型鸽不错，自行车有个黄的鼓脑门挺好。

sentences.english: He had thick veins in his forehead, a little nose, and a large chin.
sentences.chinese: 他脑门子上青筋很粗，鼻子很小，下巴可又很大。

sentences.english: Looking at the side street, Cool-man wiped his forehead as he uttered a sigh.
sentences.chinese: 看看那条胡同，老冷拍拍脑门叹了一口气。

sentences.english: Stencil it on your forehead if you must.
sentences.chinese: 如果有必要请印在自己的脑门上提醒自己。

definition: temple (on the sides of human head)
the back (human anatomy)/the back part of sth
